pr_title: Remove Unnecessary Abstraction and Add Callback

timeline.message: Fix(Issue Tracker): Remove unnecessary generics from issue tracker abstraction
Refactor(Jira Cloud): Rename ambiguous jira components
Fix(Issue Tracker): Add Alert-specific coupling to issue tracker models
Feat(Issue Tracker): Enrich issue requests and responses to enable provider callbacks
Test(Issue Tracker): Fix issue tracker unit tests

timeline.bodyText: Can we just map here instead of 2 if statements?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: We need the component item later :/
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Can we change this variable name?
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: Would we be able to convert this to a private method that's used in these if checks?
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: We're actually doing basically the same code here as in my last comment. I think these conversions my be better in their own class.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Or, perhaps we're doing these conversions too late and they should already be done instead of passed to multiple places?
replies.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: I think this is just the place where all of the flattened information is finally available. I'm actually thinking this is out of scope for now.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Fix(Issue Tracker): Clean up issue tracker code and fix jira cloud field key
Fix(Issue Tracker): Fix issue callback event sending and key serialization issues
Fix(Integration Tests): Update usage of ProviderKey
